name: slotassets
description: A simulated browser-based slot machine game demonstrating the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3.
author: brmur

scripts.build:frontend: webpack LambdaApp/index.ts --mode development --target web --devtool false -o LambdaApp/main.js
scripts.build:backend: webpack mylamdbafunction.ts --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js
